Html:
We are in process of trying Prism in VS 2010 and .NET 4.0.

Has anybody used it before? Please share your thoughts...

Hi

I migrated Prism 2 to Visual Studio 2010, and based on my smoke tests it does work. You can read more about this (and download the migrated code) in this blog post:

  • Prism 2 (Composite Application Guidance for WPF & Silverlight) migrated to Visual Studio 2010 Beta 2

Please let me know if this helps.

Damian Schenkelman
http://blogs.southworks.net/dschenkelman
